{/* Course Header */}

🔐 Cyber Security

Protect systems and networks from cyber threats. Learn **Ethical Hacking, Network Defense, and Security Tools** to become a job-ready Cyber Security Expert.

₹55,000 ₹27,499 🔥 50% OFF
{/* Course Info */}

📘 Course Overview

  • 🕒 Duration: 5 Months
  • 📚 Level: Beginner → Pro
  • 🌐 Language: English
  • 🎓 Certification: Yes
  • 👨‍🏫 Mentorship: Included
{/* What You Will Learn */}

🚀 What You Will Learn

  • Introduction to Cyber Security & Network Security
  • Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing
  • Firewalls, VPNs & Intrusion Detection Systems
  • Web Security & Secure Coding Practices
  • Risk Management & Digital Forensics
  • Hands-on Projects in Real-World Security Scenarios
